snippet.title: Now on sale! Also known as “Those Games 2” Latest promotional video released!
snippet.description:
"YEAH! YOU WANT "THOSE GAMES," RIGHT? SO HERE YOU GO! NOW, LET'S SEE YOU CLEAR THEM! 2"
Also known as Those Games 2, this is the second in our series of minigame collections. We've all seen games out there that we've wanted to play to our heart's content, but couldn't.
So, we developed this game with cute and comical stickman characters for you to fully, thoroughly, and enjoyably play as many times as you want!
Includes 5 types of minigemes with 250 stages!

For more information▼
https://www.d3p.co.jp/anoge2

【Outline of the product】
　Title: YEAH! YOU WANT "THOSE GAMES," RIGHT? SO HERE YOU GO! NOW, LET'S SEE YOU CLEAR THEM! 2
　Release date: Now on sale
　Price: Please refer to the purchase page of each platform.
　Compatibility: Nintendo Switch™, Steam®, PlayStation®4・PlayStation®5
　Genre: Mini-game collection
　Player: 1 player
　Language: Japanese, English, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, French, Italian, German, Korean, Latin American Spanish, Brazilian Portuguese
　Rating：TEEN
　Rights: ©2024 D3PUBLISHER
